insert into h3.warranty_number_inventory(parent_objectId, warranty_number, warrantyNumber_inboundLength, warrantyNumber_quantityLength_1, warrantyNumber_inventoryLength, warrantyNumber_region1, warrantyNumber_region1_length, warrantyNumber_region2, warrantyNumber_region2_length, warrantyNumber_region3, warrantyNumber_region3_length, warrantyNumber_region4, warrantyNumber_region4_length, warrantyNumber_region5, warrantyNumber_region5_length) values
